card.title: Card Component
card.desc: The Card component is a reusable UI component that renders a card with a content area. It receives two props: className (optional) and children. The className prop is used to add additional CSS classes to the component, while the children prop is used to render the content inside the card. The card is wrapped in a div element with the class card, which is generated dynamically based on whether the className prop is present or not. The content area is wrapped in another div element with the class card-content. This component can be used in any application where a card-style layout is required.
